Packages 
Package Description
ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion
Classes and constants for global access and primary functionality of the application.
ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.adapter
Collection of adapters that manage the content displayed in various views.
ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.data
Objects for wrapping and managing bowling data.
ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.database
Methods and objects which provide access to the internal database.
ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.dialog
Dialogs which prompt user for some input and offer actions upon user responses.
ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.fragment
Fragments which the application uses for all functionality.
ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.theme
Methods and variables for applying consistent theme to application.
ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.utilities
Provides methods and constants which offer general utility to the application.
ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.view
Custom views for better handling user input and UI.
